overview: Dr. Han's research focuses on preoperative therapy in breast cancer and racial disparities and breast cancer.

grants.description:
Title: A Chemotherapy-free Treatment Regimen for HER-2 Positive Breast Cancer utilizing HER2-directed Intratumoral Dendritic Cell Immunotherapy plus Trastuzumab and Pertuzumab   
Award Number: 25C18  
Sponsor: Florida Department of Health  
Han, H. (PD/PI)
